title: Prayer Celebrating God's Rainbow Promise
content:
Faithful God,

We praise You for Your wonderful promises that never fail. When Noah and his family left the ark, You set a beautiful rainbow in the sky as a sign of Your covenant.

You promised never again to destroy the earth by flood, and You have kept that promise. Every time we see a rainbow, we remember Your faithfulness.

Thank You that all Your promises are true and sure. You keep Your word to us, just as You kept Your word to Noah.

Help us to remember Your promises when we are afraid or worried. Remind us of Your love, Your protection, and Your plan for our lives.

Like the rainbow that appears after the storm, You bring hope and beauty into our lives after difficult times.

We trust in Your promises, Lord. You are faithful from generation to generation.

In Jesus' precious name, Amen.
